Traffic

NOTE: the two Traffic Complexity time series, 2014 - 2016 and 2017 - 2019, cannot be used joinly to study the full time span 2014 - 2019.
In fact they use different BADA versions and hence different aircraft characteristics for the same aircraft type; this impacts the value of the Speed Different Interacting Flows and ultimately the Traffic Complexity Score.

Data description Period

Info
Complexity (based on BADA version 3.6)
Complexity by ANSP		 Jan 2014 - Dec 2016
Complexity (based on BADA version 3.13.1)
Complexity by ANSP		 Jan 2017 - Dec 2019
